name: Clouds - FTGD JAM ENTRY
description:
Restore the lands, fight the fires, and bring back the lost Eden.

Controls: 

Movement: AWD 

Water: S

Fly: SPACE

Full Time Game Dev Game Entry:

For the 48 hour game dev challenge, and my first ever "Game" entry.  It's more like 12 hours into it, but you get the idea. I will likely fill out the rest of the actual game aspect more after this submission for the contest.

Thanks for having a look!
